analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x0200412995f1bafef0d3f97c4e28ac2515ec1ece.sol:
	Contract FollowCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x0200412995f1bafef0d3f97c4e28ac2515ec1ece.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in ERC223Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/7/0x0200412995f1bafef0d3f97c4e28ac2515ec1ece.sol#398) is a local variable never initialiazed
